
```jsx
import { CNavbarText } from '@coreui/bootstrap-react'
// or
import CNavbarText from '@coreui/bootstrap-react/src/components/navbar/CNavbarText'
```

| Property | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **className** | A string of all className you want applied to the base component. | `string` | - |
